haveAccount.title: Login
haveAccount.text: if you already have an account

errors.passwordPattern: The password must contain from 8 to 20 characters, at least 1 digit, 1 lowercase letter and 1 uppercase letter
errors.minLength: The length must be more than {{count}} characters
errors.maxLength: The length must be less than {{count}} characters
errors.required: The field must not be empty
errors.alreadyExists: A user with this email or username already exists
